price: (55) In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.[1591]
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
footnotes: [1591]- Who accomplishes whatever He wills whenever He wills.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
